Megatron Revived/ Organics:
 
"I most certainly am not joking.  I nearly crashed into him when I arrived.  Besides, I have a score to settle with him.  He is here to do what he attempted years ago: destroy the Autobot Matrix."
 
Organics stepped forward as her step brother brought the pilot with him.
"And Unicron has his minions in full force.  They managed to take our brother, a most powerful bounty hunter.  They took him with them, up there," she said, a little sad and point up, to Unicron.
"WHAT?!?" the clone roared, clinching his fists.  
Organics rushed to calm the Emperor clone, to some avail.

Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
Fortuneteller's jaw dropped, "UNICRON!!!!  THAT'S NOT
EVEN FUNNY!!!!"  She certainly thought Seer or Deus
would have informed her if the world-eating-world had
returned.

OOC:  What is going on with him, give me some details?

--- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> The femme shook the clone's hand.  He noted how
> small her hand was to his, but he wasn't the average
> transformer, and the thought entertained him enough
> for a minute grin.
> "I think it would be best to get to a base.  With
> Unicron around, it is dangeous to remain out in the
> open.  Perhaps my step sister could arrange
> something with the Maximals."
> He lead Fortuneteller to Organics and Ydrassil, to
> see both the Maximal's reaction and speak with
> Organics.
		
---------------------------------
